pli-tv-bu-vb-pc58:2.1.4: The six are linen, cotton, silk, wool, sunn hemp, and hemp; see {MS.3.1595}.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc58:2.1.10: According to [](Vin-vn-ṭ.1626) (presumably commenting on _kaddamena_ in the Kaṅkhāvitaraṇī commentary): “With mud means: water with mud, dry mud, etc. is included,” _kaddamenāti udakānukaddamasukkhakaddamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti_.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc58:2.3.6: I understand _anuvāta_ and _paribhaṇḍa_ to refer to long borders and short borders respectively.
